review: Hospital charged me Rs.1000/- instead Rs. 500/- as informed by practo. Doctor was very good. Practo should give right information regarding fees

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We appreciate the services we received from your end. We are fully satisfied with the surgery and would like to thank the doctor.

Different fee on Practo vs actual charged. Ask to pay through Practo but no option was available. Diagnostic x-rays no. can be reduced initially by doctor judgement. Elevator in IBS was not operational. It was a real tough time for patients going downstairs for x-rays having leg injury. Elevator should not be non operational for a min in hospital. In nutshell my no is for the IBS hospital and not for doctor. Dr can be consulted at other location for surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
